Key:
All right. I'm going to ask Kotori out on a date
today.
Translation: De acuerdo. Voy a pedirle a Kotori una cita hoy.

Key: ...Hello?
Hey, it's me.
Shido? What do you want?

Uh, I was wondering if you wanted to go on a
date today.
Translation: Me preguntaba si querías tener una cita hoy.

Key: A date, huh...?
Are you busy?
Not really. Fine, let's go on a date.
Translation: La verdad es que no. Bien, tengamos una cita.

Key: (Huh...? That sure seemed... easy. Weird...)
What?!
Oh, nothing. So where should we meet?"
I think we should stay home today.
Translation: Creo que hoy deberíamos quedarnos en casa.

Key: What?
Th-The weather channel said it might rain\nthis evening...
Translation: El canal del tiempo dijo que podría llover esta noche...

Key:
What? Really? But it's so nice out. I don't
remember hearing about that on the weather
channel.
Translation:
¿Cómo? ¿Qué? Pero está tan
lindo afuera. No recuerdo haber
oído eso en el canal del tiempo.

Key: Wh-Who cares! ANYWAYS! We'll have our\ndate at home!
Translation:
¡A quién le importa! ¡EN CUALQUIER CASO!
¡Tendremos nuestra cita en casa!

Key: O-Okay... Got it.
Later!
...Why was Kotori so emotional?
I'm hoooome.
You're late!
N-No way. I didn't stop anywhere on the way.
Translation: De ninguna manera. No paré en ningún sitio por el camino.

Key:
Is that why it took you so long getting home?
Jeez, you're slow in every way.
Translation:
¿Por eso tardaste tanto en llegar a casa?
Vaya, eres lento en todos los sentidos.

Key: (She's... acting her like usual self, huh?)

(Kotori was gung-ho all morning, but maybe
I was just imagining things...?)
Translation:
(Kotori ha estado muy animada toda la mañana,
pero quizá me estaba imaginando cosas...)

Key: Shido...
Hm? Y-Yeah... What's up?
Don't just stand there. Sit down.
Translation: No te quedes ahí parado. Siéntate.

Key: O-Okay. Huh? Where's everyone else?

Beats me. No one was here by the time
I came home.
Translation:
Ni idea. No había nadie
cuando llegué a casa.

Key: That's odd. I wonder where they went.
Translation: Qué raro. Me pregunto a dónde fueron.

Key:
We're in the middle of a date, and you're
worrying about other girls?
Translation:
Estamos en medio de una cita,
¿y te preocupas por otras chicas?

Key: No. It's not like that.
Hmph. Suspicious.
Whatever. Now you sit there. I'll pour some tea.
Translation:
Como quieras. Ahora siéntate ahí.
Voy a servir un poco de té.

Key: Oh, I will...
I said I'm going to do it!
I-I see. Thanks, Kotori.
Hmph.
Kotori... is really aggressive.

Hm. I wonder if it's okay for me to let her
do it.
Translation: Hm. Me pregunto si está bien que la deje hacerlo.

Key:
I have nothing to do while I wait, so maybe
I could help her out.
Translation:
No tengo nada que hacer mientras espero,
así que quizá pueda ayudarla.

Key: Huh? Aah!
S-Sorry! Are you okay? Are you hurt at all?
Y-Yeah.
Okay, good.
But... my clothes are wet.
I guess you'll have to take a bath and change.
Translation: Supongo que tendrás que bañarte y cambiarte.

Key:
Huh? I-It's fine. This is nothing. It'll dry
eventually.
Translation:
¿Eh? E-está bien. Esto no es nada.
Se secará eventualmente.

Key: But what if you catch a cold?
Oh...
Come on. I'll clean up.
B-But...
Why are you resisting?
Because... I'm finally alone with you...
Translation: Porque... Por fin estoy a solas contigo...

Key: Huh?

We're on a date, and I don't want to spend
time on that.
Translation:
Estamos en una cita, y no
quiero gastar tiempo en eso.

Key: (WH-WH-WH-WH-WH-WHAT IS KOTORI SAYING?!)

(It's almost like she doesn't want to bathe
because she wants to be with me as long as
possible. Nonono. That's my sister. It can't be.)
Translation:
(Es casi como si no quisiera bañarse porque
quiere estar conmigo el mayor tiempo posible.
Nonono. Es mi hermana. No puede ser.)

Key:
(A-Anyways, I should calm down. It should be
my priority to have her take a bath. Yeah, that's
right. Think about the rest later, right? Yeah!)
Translation:
(De todos modos, debería calmarme. Debería ser
mi prioridad hacerla tomar un baño. Sí, así es.
Piensa en el resto más tarde, ¿verdad? ¡Sí!)

Key: G-Go on! Just take a bath, okay?!
B-But...
I-I'll go with you! So, come on!
Huh...?
How did things come to this?
(Uh, no. This was all my fault.)
Translation: (Uh, no. Todo esto fue culpa mía.)

Key:
(I never thought Kotori would agree to it! I
thought she'd call me a big pervert! Then, she'd
punch me and storm off to the bathroom.)
Translation:
(¡Nunca pensé que Kotori aceptaría! ¡Pensé que me
llamaría pervertido! Luego me daría un puñetazo
y se iría furiosa al baño).

Key: Shido, I'm going in, so turn around.
Translation: Shido, voy a entrar, así que date la vuelta.

Key: O-Okay.
...Scoot over.
I-I can't. This is the limit.
Translation: No puedo. Este es el límite.

Key: Guess it can't be helped then.
Translation: Supongo que entonces no se puede evitar.

Key: Uuuuuhhh... Um...
What? This was your idea. You're pathetic.
Translation: ¿De qué? Esto fue idea tuya. Eres patético.

Key: W-Well, I didn't think it'd happen.

I mean, I took measures to keep people away.
It's pointless if I can't be with you.
Translation:
Quiero decir, tomé medidas para mantener a la gente
alejada. No tiene sentido si no puedo estar contigo.

Key: Huh? What? Sorry... I didn't get that.
...I was talking to myself.
But... this feels nostalgic.
Huh...?
We always took baths like this as children.
Translation: De niños siempre nos bañábamos así.

Key: I... I don't remember anything like that.
Translation: N… No recuerdo nada de eso.

Key:
How could I forget so easily? It's a memory
with my sister, after all.
Translation:
¿Cómo pude olvidarlo tan fácilmente? Es un
recuerdo con mi hermana, después de todo.

Key: Shido...
But man, you haven't grown muc—
Translation: Pero hombre, no has crecido muc-

Key: OUCH! What the heck?!
That was so rude!

W-Well, what did you want to say? "My,
how much you've grown"?
Translation:
Bueno, ¿qué querías decir?
¿"Vaya, cuánto has crecido"?

Key: Ew, yuck. Not that, either.
Then what should I have said?
Don't say anything! Just sit there!
...?! O-Okay.
That's right. Just like that. Quiet.
Hm? Is someone calling?

Oh. Reine. Yeah, thanks for today... and for
covering for me.
Translation:
Oh. Reine. Sí, gracias por lo
de hoy... y por cubrirme.

Key:
Huh? Tohka and Yoshino are coming?
Wh-What do you mean?!
Any minute now... Wait, Reine...?! Oh...
Well, that's predictable.
Wh-What's the matter?
I can't let them see this... Shido!
Translation: No puedo dejar que vean esto... ¡Shido!

Key: Wh-What is it?!

How long are you gonna be in there for?!
Hurry up and get out!
Translation:
¡¿Cuánto tiempo vas a estar ahí?!
¡Date prisa y sal!

Key:
Wh-What's the matter, Kotori? And don't
just stand up!
Huh? Aah! Wh-What are you staring at?!
OUCH!
Shido! I'm home!
*pant, pant*... S-Seems like I made it in time.
Translation: *jadear, jadear*... Parece que llegué a tiempo.

Key:
*pant, pant*... Seems like it. W-Welcome home,
you two.
Translation:
*pant, pant*... Eso parece.
B-Bienvenidas a casa, ustedes dos.

Key:
Sorry. I knew you two were having fun. I should
have bought more time, but...
Translation:
Perdonen. Sabía que se estaban divirtiendo.
Debería haber ganado más tiempo, pero...

Key: F-Fun... It wasn't like that.
Oh...? Am I mistaken?
I-I DON'T KNOW!
